title: Attempting to recconnect issue
body:
Hello. 
I want some help to fix this issue:,,Attempting to Recconnect''.The issue I'm having occurs like 24 hours/24.I just spawn and after that attempting to recconnect problem is on.I played a ranked game and i lost LP because of that.I've done a lot of forum reading and it seems a lot of people are having the same issue with the "Attempting to Reconnect".My internet works just fine I made a photo on how my internet speed is and the game still not working.Please I want to play this game again.
Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to our server is being interrupted by *packet loss* or *high packet buffering*. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address any potentially conflicting network settings that could be causing this.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
